member.name: IMFMuxStreamMediaTypeManager.AddStreamConfiguration
member.summary: Registers a stream configuration, which defines a set of substreams that can be included the multiplexed output.
member.param: A bitmask value where the bits that are on represent the indices of the substreams that are included in the stream configuration.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The specified configuration is already registered.
The supplied bitmask has bits set that are invalid for the media source.
There is insufficient memory to complete the operation.

member.name: IMFMuxStreamMediaTypeManager.GetMediaType
member.summary: Gets the of the substream with the specified index.
member.param: The index of the substream for which the media type is retrieved.
The media type of the substream with the specified index.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The stream specified substream index is invalid. Call to get the number of substreams managed by the multiplexed media source.
The media type of the specified substream is invalid.

member.name: IMFMuxStreamMediaTypeManager.GetStreamConfiguration
member.summary: Gets the stream configuration with the specified index, which defines a set of substreams that can be included the multiplexed output.
member.param: The index of the configuration to retrieve.
The index of the configuration to retrieve.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The specified configuration index is not valid.

member.name: IMFMuxStreamMediaTypeManager.GetStreamConfigurationCount
member.summary: Gets the count of registered stream configurations, which define set of substreams that can be included the multiplexed output.
member.param: The number of registered stream configurations.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFMuxStreamMediaTypeManager.GetStreamCount
member.summary: Gets the count of substreams managed by the multiplexed media source.
member.param: The count of substreams managed by the multiplexed media source.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFMuxStreamMediaTypeManager.RemoveStreamConfiguration
member.summary: Unregisters a stream configuration, which defines a set of substreams that can be included the multiplexed output.
member.param: A bitmask value where the bits that are on represent the indices of the substreams that are included in the stream configuration.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The specified configuration is not currently registered.
There is insufficient memory to complete the operation.

member.name: IMFMuxStreamMediaTypeManager
member.summary: Enables the management of stream configurations for a multiplexed media source. A stream configuration defines a set of substreams that can be included the multiplexed output.
